author: Phil
content: Should dock it next to the USS Cod Submarine Memorial in Cleveland, Ohio.

author: Chris Roche
content: I despair at the short-sightedness of all in positions of influence we have the same problems in just about all areas cultural in the UK where we have an equally lamentable record. It is not that there is no money in this day and age it is just that it is in the wrong hands there do not seem to be people of money who see it as their philanthropic duty to share their vast wealth for the general good. It cannot be beyond possible for a corporate or wealthy individual to front up with the funding necessary to not only guarantee a berth but future maintenance of this most important vessel.
